formattedAddress: 64 Carmine St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 64 Carmine St, New York, NY 10014, USA

editorialSummary.text: Stylish eatery offering local & Russian dishes, plus brunch classics & funky cocktails in pouches.

originalText.text:
WOW. WOW. WOW.
From the quality of the food, to the beautifully decorated interior, to the exquisite drinks, to the exceptional service. I am just in shock. This restaurant is amazing. The entire experience was well worth it. Met the owner Alan, he was amazing and was very very hospitable.

We did visit this restaurant around the holidays, close near to Christmas, therefore it was extremely packed inside, and we did have to wait a little past our reservation time, but trust me the experience was worth the wait!

I will definitely be planning to come back here, to see what they have to offer for other holidays and seasonal themes.

originalText.text: Had an anomalous time here for date night with my husband! The owner really deserves his flowers for the way he goes above and beyond for his guests. He came to our table and gave us the history of the restaurant in honor of his beloved mother. Then was so kind to give us love potions on the house. The food was decadent and filling! It was my first time trying Ukrainian food and it did not disappoint.The ambiance was just as amazing. With the most adorable decor of roses and stuffed teddy bears. I havenâ€™t had an experience like this in a very long time at a restaurant if ever! The craft beers were imported from Ukraine and they were great! If in town or from out of town please go to Sveta you will not regret it!

originalText.text: Iâ€™ve been coming to Sveta for 3+ years and have had stellar experiences each time! The restaurant is owned by a very kind mother & son duo who specialize in creating beautifully-presented drinks, delicious European cuisine, and memorable experiences. Iâ€™ve brought friends from London and Australia here and theyâ€™ve absolutely loved it! Looking forward to returning soon!

originalText.text: Solid 5 stars! We did have to wait longer for our table, even though we had a reservation set, but every second was worth it. Beautiful venue, service was excellent, and overall experience was unforgettable! The drinks are NYC top level, beautifully done and delicious! The food was delicious, everyone enjoyed their plate and each dish was amazingly tasty! The service was caring and attentive. As it was awhile to wait for our table, they kept checking back with us if we were ok. It's fine because they weren't pushing our party out the door when we were taking our time to enjoy our meal. 100000% recommend this location for sure.

originalText.text: From start to finish our experience was amazing! We were greeted by the owner at the door and he was beaming with pride to tell us the story of his restaurant and how it was named after his mother. He was so personable and warm our entire experience.  The drink presentation was INCREDIBLE and the food couldnâ€™t have been better. Not to mention the decor and ambiance was SO FUN (& instagram worthy ðŸ˜›) Must visit!
